title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Inclusive Science Education Design Based on Multiple Intelligences Theory and UDL

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can derive 5+ activity examples applying the 8 types of multiple intelligences theory to science classes.
Learners can design 3+ types of science curriculum digital materials (videos, simulations, interactive worksheets) according to UDL principles.
Learners can develop accessible assessment tools for all learners by integrating linguistic, visual, and mathematical representations when designing summative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
